name: Gustaf de Laval
obverse: Bust of Gustaf de Laval facing right.
obverse_inscriptions: GUSTAF PATRIK DE LAVAL FODD 1845 DOD 1913
reverse: Prometheus lighting a stick on fire. He is raising a blanket up with his left hand.
description: Gustaf de Laval was a Swedish engineer and inventor who made important contributions to the design of steam turbines and dairy machinery.
A total of 250 examples were minted in bronze, silver, and gold.
